attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With each party trying to outdo the other on who is greener, let’s have a proper debate from the public, do we support ever increasing taxation?
 Is this just another tax raising con to fill the Government coffers?  Where is the green tax going?
Will this affect the lower paid worker harder? So many questions but no clear answers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
